diseases.name: Tomato___Late_blight
diseases.prevention: Space plants for airflow, avoid overhead watering, use resistant varieties.
diseases.remedy: Apply fungicides, remove infected plants, practice crop rotation.

diseases.name: Tomato___healthy
symptoms: No visible symptoms, plant is healthy.
diseases.prevention: Regular watering, maintain soil health, provide proper sunlight.

diseases.name: Grape___healthy
symptoms: No visible symptoms, plant is healthy.
diseases.prevention: Provide adequate nutrients, prune regularly for air circulation.

diseases.name: Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening)
diseases.prevention: Use disease-free saplings, control psyllid populations.
diseases.remedy: Remove and destroy infected trees, apply insecticides to control vectors.

diseases.name: Soybean___healthy
symptoms: No visible symptoms, plant is healthy.
diseases.prevention: Ensure balanced soil nutrients and water regularly.

diseases.name: Squash___Powdery_mildew
diseases.prevention: Space plants for airflow, avoid wetting the foliage.
diseases.remedy: Apply sulfur-based fungicides, remove infected leaves.

diseases.name: Potato___healthy
symptoms: No visible symptoms, plant is healthy.
diseases.prevention: Maintain good soil, provide adequate water and sunlight.

diseases.name: Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight
diseases.prevention: Use resistant hybrids, rotate crops, avoid monoculture.
diseases.remedy: Apply fungicides early, remove infected leaves.

diseases.name: Tomato___Early_blight
symptoms: brown spots on leaves with concentric rings
diseases.prevention: Use mulch, rotate crops, avoid overhead watering.

diseases.name: Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot
symptoms: small circular spots with dark borders on leaves
diseases.prevention: Rotate crops, ensure good air circulation, avoid leaf wetting.
diseases.remedy: Apply copper-based fungicides, remove infected leaves.

diseases.name: Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot_Gray_leaf_spot
diseases.prevention: Use resistant hybrids, rotate crops regularly.
diseases.remedy: Apply fungicides, remove and destroy affected leaves.

diseases.name: Strawberry___Leaf_scorch
diseases.prevention: Ensure proper spacing, avoid overhead watering, prune for air circulation.

diseases.name: Peach___healthy
symptoms: No visible symptoms, plant is healthy.
diseases.prevention: Regular watering, proper sunlight, and good soil maintenance.

diseases.name: Apple___Apple_scab
symptoms: dark, velvety spots on leaves and fruit
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties, prune trees for better air circulation.
diseases.remedy: Apply fungicides, remove and destroy infected leaves and fruit.

diseases.name: Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus
diseases.prevention: Control whiteflies, use virus-resistant varieties.
diseases.remedy: Remove infected plants, apply insecticides to control vectors.

diseases.name: Tomato___Bacterial_spot
symptoms: water-soaked spots on leaves and fruit
diseases.prevention: Rotate crops, avoid overhead watering, disinfect tools.
diseases.remedy: Apply copper-based bactericides, remove and destroy infected plants.

diseases.name: Apple___Black_rot
diseases.prevention: Prune trees for better air circulation, remove fallen fruit and leaves.

diseases.name: Blueberry___healthy
symptoms: No visible symptoms, plant is healthy.
diseases.prevention: Maintain proper soil acidity, water adequately, prune regularly.

diseases.name: Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew
diseases.prevention: Ensure good air circulation, avoid leaf wetting.

diseases.name: Peach___Bacterial_spot
symptoms: small, dark spots on leaves and fruit
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties, avoid leaf wetting.
diseases.remedy: Apply copper-based bactericides, remove infected plants.

diseases.name: Apple___Cedar_apple_rust
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties, remove nearby juniper hosts.

diseases.name: Tomato___Target_Spot
symptoms: brown spots with dark rings on leaves
diseases.prevention: Rotate crops, prune for air circulation, avoid overhead watering.

diseases.name: Pepper,_bell___healthy
symptoms: No visible symptoms, plant is healthy.
diseases.prevention: Provide adequate water, sunlight, and nutrient-rich soil.

diseases.name: Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spot)
diseases.prevention: Ensure good air circulation, prune regularly.

diseases.name: Potato___Late_blight
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties, avoid overhead watering.

diseases.name: Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus
diseases.prevention: Disinfect tools, avoid handling plants when wet.
diseases.remedy: Remove infected plants, avoid tobacco contamination.

diseases.name: Strawberry___healthy
symptoms: No visible symptoms, plant is healthy.
diseases.prevention: Provide adequate water, sunlight, and nutrient-rich soil.

symptoms: No visible symptoms, plant is healthy.
diseases.prevention: Maintain proper care, prune regularly, and water adequately.

diseases.prevention: Prune for air circulation, remove fallen leaves and fruit.
